message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $100 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $105? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.
I'm glad you think the product would be a great fit for you, Bob! I can see you're serious about it. I'm willing to come down a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $115.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $108? I'm really interested in making this work.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110 again, but I'm also considering selling it to someone else if we can't come to an agreement. Let's meet at $110 and see if we can finalize the deal.
I'm not willing to go back to $110, but I'm willing to meet you at $109. Can we finalize the deal at this price?
I'm not willing to go back and forth forever, Bob. I'm willing to make one last counteroffer. I'll meet you at $112, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $108, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
